title: Citigold Airport Lounge in Prague Increasingly Popular with Citi Clients
summary: Prague - The popularity of comfortable travel coupled with visits to exclusive airport lounges before departure has noticeably increased among Czechs. Citi's Citigold Lounge in the departure hall of Terminal 2 at the Václav Havel Airport in Prague registered a record 14,427 visits from Citigold program clients last year. Compared with 2012, the visitor rate grew by more than 33 percent. It is the first airport lounge of its kind to be opened at Prague airport in 2010; since then, more than 32,000 Citigold program clients have spent time there waiting for their departure in a comfortable environment. The lounge is accessible for a fee for other passengers who are not Citi clients, and the total number of visits to the Citigold Lounge is therefore even larger.
tag-1: Citigold Airport Lounge in Prague Increasingly Popular with Citi Clients
tag-2: Prague – The popularity of comfortable travel coupled with visits to exclusive airport lounges before departure has noticeably increased among Czechs. Citi's Citigold Lounge in the departure hall of Terminal 2 at the Václav Havel Airport in Prague registered a record 14,427 visits from Citigold program clients last year. Compared with 2012, the visitor rate grew by more than 33 percent. It is the first airport lounge of its kind to be opened at Prague airport in 2010; since then, more than 32,000 Citigold program clients have spent time there waiting for their departure in a comfortable environment. The lounge is accessible for a fee for other passengers who are not Citi clients, and the total number of visits to the Citigold Lounge is therefore even larger.
tag-3: "Access to the Citigold Lounge has long been one of the most popular non-banking benefits that Citi offers its clients. Our clients appreciate the privacy that the Citigold Lounge offers them on their travels abroad," says Veronika Španárová, Retail Bank Head at Citi Czech Republic. "In addition, some other aspects are important for them, such as free parking at the airport for Citigold customers and individual security checks through which they pass completely separately from other passengers at the airport."
tag-4: The services provided by the Citigold Lounge, which is accessible for all Citigold program clients and accompanying persons free of charge, also include cabin luggage check-in directly in the lounge, all-inclusive refreshments, and TV, Wi-Fi and daily newspapers. Individual security checks, through which they pass completely separately from the other passengers at the airport, thereby avoiding what frequently are very personal checks that may be quite embarrassing in public, are also a very comfortable feature of the lounge.
tag-5: "Last year, the Citigold Lounge registered the highest visitor rate in September and October, which can be explained by, among other factors, a broader range of cheaper air trips offered in late summer and also an increase in business trips in early fall," adds Veronika Španárová.
